name: 77 Oleander Avenue
description:
77 Oleander Avenue Ghost House Investigation is a narrative driven Horror Mystery game that follows Tabby, a paranormal investigator who wakes up in an abandoned house with no memory of where she is or why she's there. Through the course of the game you'll learn more about the family that once occupied the home, the mysterious circumstances surrounding their deaths, and ultimately decide what you believe about the haunting of 77 Oleander. Set in a small coastal city in southeastern North Carolina, the game explores deep-seated religious trauma, the nature of ghosts and demons, the way we create narratives of a person's Death, and contemplates the prospect of flirting with a supernatural orb.

Instructions and Controls


77 Oleander is a Visual Novel in which you'll need to explore the rooms and levels of an abandoned house in order to find your cell phone, wallet, and the keys to your truck so that you can get out as soon as possible. It won't be that simple, but let's start there for now. You begin by choosing one of three parts of the house to search, and once you've searched all three areas you'll need to declare your theories and beliefs about the history and the hauntings of 77 Oleander Avenue. Your beliefs, your conclusions, and your view of the family that once lived here will determine the ending you reach.

Keyboard/Mouse
Left Click/Spacebar/Enter - Confirm/Advance Dialogue
Esc/Right Click - Open Menu
Mouse/Arrow Keys - Navigate dialogue choices & menu options
A - Enable Auto-mode
Page Up - Rolls back to previous dialogue/choices
Ctrl - Skips previously read dialogue/actions
Ctrl+A - Opens the Accessibility Menu
H - Hides User Interface
S - Screenshot

Gamepad (Steampad, PS4/5, XBox controller compatible)
D-Pad, Joysticks: Navigates game interface, selects options
A: Advances Dialogue and confirms choice selections
B: Take a Screenshot
X: Enable Auto-mode
Y: Hides the User Interface
Start/Select: Opens the game menu
L1/L2: Rolls back to previous dialogue/choices
R1/R2: Skips previously read dialogue/actions
L3/R3: Opens the Accessibility Menu

Key Features


  • The full game contains 9 endings, multiple routes and at least six ways to die;
  • a complex and insidious mystery, something horrible that may be watching you at all times, dozens of opportunities to flirt with a ghost, and more!
  • Multiple routes, 9 endings, and dozens of very unsafe haunted rooms to explore;
  • A unique system for selecting your final route: Your beliefs and theories about 77 Oleander will determine the ending you reach.
  • A Real Dog* that you can pet;
  • A Non-linear narrative that shifts based on your belief and conclusions;
  • Orb Interaction;
  • And More!

*Dog is real, dog is not composed of fur or flesh.
